spec.name: Moroccan Sfenj (Donuts)
spec.description: This location represents a typical street vendor or small shop specializing in **Sfenj** (Moroccan donuts), a popular deep-fried pastry staple of Moroccan street food. Sfenj are traditionally consumed hot, often for breakfast or as a snack. The location indicates a thriving, local street food spot where these classic treats are made and sold.
